import React from "react"; import Dropdown from "react-bootstrap/Dropdown"; import DropdownButton from "react-bootstrap/DropdownButton"; import ButtonGroup from "react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import Botao from './Botao'; export default props => { const lista_todos = props.tabela.map(dados => { return (
Id Nome Nota 1 Nota 2 Nota 3 Selecionar

) }) return(
